short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add context menu to save quotes which can be viewed on any Chrome tab from the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add quotes from any Chrome tab by simply selecting some text and secondary clicking. Organize quotes into workspaces, and search for key phrases to help your gather data, make notes and come back to interesting web pages. 

Changelog 
Version 1.0.2
- Fixed issue with build script which stopped extension from being installed

Version 1.0.1
- Minor UI improvements and fixes
- Some code clean up
